SEARCH
Package scot.gov.scotaccountclient

Class VerificationController

java.lang.Object
scot.gov.scotaccountclient.VerificationController
@Controller public class VerificationController extends Object
Controller for handling the verification flow after initial authentication. This controller manages the process of requesting additional verified attributes from ScotAccount after the user has been authenticated.

    • showVerificationOptions

      @GetMapping("/verify") public String showVerificationOptions(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.oidc.user.OidcUser user, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays the verification options page where users can select which attributes they want to verify.
      Parameters:
      model - The Spring MVC model
      user - The authenticated OIDC user
      session - The HTTP session
      Returns:
      The name of the verification options template

    • requestVerification

      @PostMapping("/verify") public String requestVerification(@RequestParam(value="scopes",required=false) List<String> scopes, org.springframework.security.oauth2.client.authentication.OAuth2AuthenticationToken authentication, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the verification request by storing the requested scopes in the session and initiating a new OAuth2 flow with the additional scopes.
      Parameters:
      scopes - The list of scopes requested for verification
      authentication - The OAuth2 authentication token
      session - The HTTP session
      redirectAttributes - For adding flash attributes
      Returns:
      Redirect to the OAuth2 authorization endpoint
